mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_BACKPORT_CONDI(port_num, backtest_cnt, back_test_date, user_id, back_title, back_descript, back_start_asset, back_start_date , back_end_date, back_fee_rate, back_slippage, back_tax_rate, back_stock_cnt, back_rebal_cycle,back_invest_rate ,back_Market, back_Care, back_Manage, back_Preferred, back_Etf,back_CashFlow, back_Profit ,back_Trans_Amt,back_Amt,back_Market_Cap,back_Cap, back_Buy_Price, back_Sell_Price,back_Min_PriceS,back_Min_PriceV,back_Min_Price, back_Cap_UpDown,back_Cap_Rate, back_pbr,back_per,back_psr,back_pcr,back_roa,back_roe,back_ros,back_ebitda,back_cfps) VALUES(seq_backtest_condi_port.NEXTVAL,#{backtestCnt},sysdate,#{userId},#{backTitle},#{backDescript},#{backStartAsset},#{backStartDate},#{backEndDate},#{backFeeRate}, #{backSlippage}, #{backTaxRate}, #{backStockCnt},#{backRebalCycle},#{backInvestRate},#{backMarket},#{backCare},#{backManage},#{backPreferred},#{backEtf}, #{backCashFlow},#{backProfit},#{backTransAmt},#{backAmt},#{backMarketCap},#{backCap},#{backBuyPrice},#{backSellPrice}, #{backMinPriceS}, #{backMinPriceV},#{backMinPrice},#{backCapUpDown},#{backCapRate},#{backPBR},#{backPER},#{backPSR},#{backPCR},#{backROA},#{backROE},#{backROS},#{backEBITDA},#{backCFPS})
mapper.select: select port_num from t_backport_condi where user_id = #{userId} and backtest_cnt = #{backtestCnt}

select back_no, port_num, user_id, stock_name, stock_code, to_char(back_date,'YYYY-MM-DD') as back_date, trans_kind, stock_price, stock_cnt, buy_price, sell_price, to_char(buy_date,'YYYY-MM-DD') as buy_date, to_char(sell_date,'YYYY-MM-DD') as sell_date, sale_price, total_stock_cnt, earning_rate, total_stock_price from t_trans_stock where port_num = #{portNum} and user_id=#{userId} order by back_no, back_date

select back_no, port_num, user_id, to_char(back_date,'YYYY-MM-DD') as back_date, total_bal, total_deposit, buy_total_price, sell_total_price, total_stock_price, back_fee, earning_rate from t_back_result where port_num = #{portNum} and user_id=#{userId} order by back_no, back_date

select back_no, port_num, user_id, to_char(back_date,'YYYY-MM-DD') as back_date, total_bal, total_deposit, buy_total_price, sell_total_price, total_stock_price, back_fee, earning_rate from t_back_result where port_num = #{portNum} and user_id=#{userId} order by back_no desc

select back_no, port_num, user_id, to_char(stock_date,'YYYY-MM-DD') as stock_date, stock_fluc, stock_day_fluc, kospi_fluc, kospi_day_fluc, kosdaq_fluc, kosdaq_day_fluc from t_yield where port_num = #{portNum} order by back_no, stock_date
mapper.update: update t_backport_condi set back_title = #{backTitle}, back_descript=#{backDescript} where port_num = #{portNum}
mapper.select: select to_char(stock_date, 'YY/MM') stock_date, trunc(avg(stock_fluc)) stock_fluc, trunc(avg(KOSPI_FLUC)) KOSPI_FLUC, trunc(avg(kosdaq_fluc)) kosdaq_fluc, sum(stock_day_fluc) stock_day_fluc, sum(kospi_day_fluc) kospi_day_fluc, sum(kosdaq_day_fluc) kosdaq_day_fluc from t_yield where port_num=#{portNum} group by to_char(stock_date, 'YY/MM') order by stock_date

select user_id, stock_name, stock_code, to_char(back_date,'yyyy-mm-dd') back_date, stock_price, stock_cnt, buy_price, sale_price, total_stock_cnt, earning_rate from t_trans_stock where port_num =#{portNum} and back_date = (select max(back_date) from t_trans_stock where port_num = #{portNum})

select r.port_num as port_num, back_title, back_date, earning_rate from t_back_result r, t_backport_condi c where c.port_num = r.port_num and (r.port_num, back_date) in (select port_num, max(back_date) from t_back_result where user_id = #{userId} group by port_num) order by back_date
